question: If a : b = 5 : 7 and c : d = 2a :  3b, then ac : bd is:
explanation:
$latex \\frac{a}{b} = \\frac{5}{7},  \\frac{c}{d} = \\frac{2a}{3b}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{a}{b}\\times\\frac{c}{d} = \\frac{5}{7}\\times\\frac{2a}{3b}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{ac}{bd} = \\frac{10}{21}\\times\\frac{5}{7}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{ac}{bd} = \\frac{50}{147}= 50 : 147&s=1$
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
